body: Lazy art (as in unimaginative), bit passable

Not sure about the Yuri tag, since it was a dream, but then again, don't wanna confuse people who hate the tag, which I'm actually surprised that they exist, I think it's just a counter part for the anti-yaoi, so I guess it shouldn't be too surprising Tbh, anyhow, agree fully with StarLight-tu
This doujin should has 'girls only' and 'yuri' tags since it has Cocoa makes love with Chino and the whole doujin doesn't appear any male character.
